pages.title: Dirt Bucket
pages.text: Dirt buckets are used to convert a seed to a sapling and vice versa.$(br2)Place the dirt bucket and the seed or sapling in a crafting table to convert. The recipe is shapeless.

pages.title: Dirt Bucket
pages.text: To obtain a dirt bucket simply combine a dirt block with a bucket.$(br2)Right click on the ground with the bucket to empty it, if you need to.
